ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/RNTester.xcworkspace -scheme RNTester -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO -quiet
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 8

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/RNTester.xcworkspace -scheme RNTester -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO -quiet
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 8
